Articles.Content:
So, I'm joining the ranks of people suffering from constant crashes and general instability.

Mainly when switching between crafts, quickloading, entering/leaving VAB/SPH, at mediocre graphics settings.

The strangest thing is, this problem only appeared after the release of .90, before that I could play to my hearts content on much higher graphics settings, even without using ATM and with other, RAM-heavy mods installed such as MKS/OKS, B9 and FAR.

I realize that I can't expect to have everything on a not-exactly-top-of-the-line rig, but really, what happened in .90?

Specs:

Win7 x32 HP

Intel Core [email protected]

GeForce GT 650M

8GB Ram (3.16 usable)

Mods installed (All are updated):

ATM Aggressive x86

Enhanced Navball

Kerbal Attachment System

KWRocketry

Mechjeb

Procedural Fairings

ScanSat

TacFuelBalancer

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Karbonite

KarbonitePlus

and all their individual dependencies

Output.log:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/10718223/output_log.txt

Also, my VAB looks like this. I don't know if it means anything, but who knows.

Thanks a lot in advance!

Edited January 27, 2015 by Shawarmakriger
